basics.name: Shubham Jain
basics.label: Machine Learning, Web & Cloud.
basics.summary: I love designing highly scalable, cost effective and powerful systems. I have been into designing system level modules using the rust, and these days I spend time exploiting the power of Machine learning. I'm also a vocalist, multi-instrumentalist, and music producer, having involvements in many music projects.   I'm also probably the youngest (globally) to have completed all 5 AWS certifications (including Solutions architect Pro and Dev-ops engineer pro).

location.address: 4415/14, Lotan Jat street, Pahari Dhiraj, Sadar Bazar

work.summary: I'm working with XWiki to create an importer for Docuwiki projects to XWiki, ensuring consistency and flexibility. I'll be leveraging the XWiki's streams framework for this project.
highlights: Extend the enterprise grade custom java streams framework
Create a driver to port data from file based storage system to SQL database

work.summary: Amazon Internet Services private limited is the Indian entity for Amazon Web Services in India. I've worked with Business development, sales and the solutions architect teams. I've worked with dozens of startups and enterprises to create scalable, cost effective, fault tolerant, and powerful systems. I've also completed all 5 AWS certifications during my internship.
highlights: Interaction and migration with numerous on startups and SMBs
Close association with Solutions architect, Business development, and Operations team.
Probably the youngest (globally) to pass all 5 AWS certification exams.

work.summary: We built an end-to-end platform for selling the 'Next' brand appliances. The startup handled the online business for Next appliances. Apart from the primary business, we focused more on creating interesting technology, most notable one was: A web service that brings apple's continuity features (including calling) to the masses.
highlights: Highly decoupled architecture designed on AWS for the web service enabling very low latency experience
Experimented many e-commerce platforms for the web
Implemented custom bluetooth protocol to support transferring audio to PC, however it turned out to be very specific to the bluetooth stack.

work.summary: I worked on creating a Point of Sale (POS) system, using some great javascript libraries, mongoDB, deployed it to a raspberry pi. The goal was to make it end to end, and light enough to support raspberry pi as the central server.
highlights: Ported Oracle SQL based system to mongoDB and wrote query wrappers using mongoDB functions
Designed the whole server to run on Raspberry Pi with lowered latency.
Designed the front end on using custom android image to enable immersive kiosk mode

work.summary: I tested and benchmarked various enterprise applications on variety of platforms. The test ensured validity of various SLAs.
highlights: First exposure to corporate systems and environment
Learned about extensive testing suites, cloud, and AI

awards.title: CSI Young IT Professional, North India
awards.summary: I along with Neha gupta, won the award for our research on designing an IoT chip architecture using Nvidia Tegra reference and simulated it using Nvidia Teslas
